It have a very high quality CCD meaning a cathode plate at lens to convert visible light electromagetism to electrical eletron binary to you cam processor.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Brandie
Reviews.Content: I had an earlier version of this camera and I'd had it for about 5 years when it finally stopped working. I bought this one to replace it and it is pretty much the same but has more mega pixels and some more features so it was pretty easy to figure out how to use it. I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: You can get a better camera for the price. The images are a bit opaque. Due to the poor quality of the images stop using it.
Reviews.Author: KELBIS R. RAMIREZ
Reviews.Content: You can get a better camera for the price. The images are a bit opaque. Due to the poor quality of the images stop using it. Preferred buy another.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Teresa F. Jordan
Reviews.Content: great value, good pictures and easy to carry.  The color also makes it visible so you are not apt to leave it somewhere.

Reviews.Title: Very clean and complete
Reviews.Author: Merriwin
Reviews.Content: The seller did an exceptional job of selling a camera complete with charging cord, battery, and there may have been an sd card (I can't remember for sure). But I do remember how clean and well packaged the camera arrived. The camera takes great pictures. The only thing that I wish I had been better informed on is that the camera has only basic point and shoot capabilities. It does not have special shooting functions like fast action shots, night shots, macro shots, etc. But for a great little camera, the price point is spot on.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Dayled Colina
Reviews.Content: I did receive this item on time, and covered my expectations. I recommend to buy it as this is a good product

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected from Nikon
Reviews.Author: ken sager
Reviews.Content: Got this little guy to replace my Sony Cybershot. I use my camera for some (very) amateur photography and vlogging for a YouTube channel. Most of the time, the photos are good quality, but sometimes they come out blurry (slow/stubborn focus?) and deceptively lighter in real life, regardless of lighting or white balance setting. The video drives me NUTS. There's a constant roar in the background when this thing records. Inside. No wind. I knew that when I bought it because I found sample footage online, but now I can't stand it. I'm looking at upgrading to something fancier so my videos look more professional.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Shore Al "Shore Al"
Reviews.Content: Very nice pictures while very simple to use - small size so easy to keep on person, slips into top shirt pocket

Reviews.Title: Slooooow
Reviews.Author: Kaylia
Reviews.Content: Ummmm.. this camera takes waay too long to record images and so taking pictures in quick succession cannot be considered. I use it only when I absolutely have to. Wouldn't recommend in this day and age.

Reviews.Title: This camera is a piece of garbage….
Reviews.Author: Dean Rocco Perrone "DP"
Reviews.Content: Let me first start off by saying I own 2 other Nikon's which are great.  I have also been a real estate appraiser for 13 years so I use cameras every single day…all day.  I literally purchased this camera a week ago…  had it in my pocket with NOTHING else,  and somehow the inside of the entire screen has cracked and spider webbed.  There is not a single mark, scratch….Nothing on the actual screen itself so I have no idea how the inside of the screen is shattered.  The camera is completely useless now.  1 week….. I have owned cameras that last several years…  This think is junk and you would be much smarter spending an extra $20-50 bucks and purchasing something else that doesn't break after 1 week.  Again….not one single mark on the actual screen yet the inside of the screen somehow is shattered.  JUNK….

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Latoya graham
Reviews.Content: I so love this camera! It takes the perfect pictures and can take them out easy.. thinking about getting this as a gift for aFriend.

Reviews.Title: did not get what they advertised.
Reviews.Author: Bertram Sweeney
Reviews.Content: Ii is not a s3300 it is a Nikon Coolpix s3200 it is not what they advertised. other then that its in great shape

Reviews.Title: Love my camera
Reviews.Author: Rosemarie Mancini
Reviews.Content: It is a small camera, works so well. Takes a Beautiful clear picture, and Love the color. I use it all the time to take pictures of everything and my Grandkids

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3300
Reviews.Author: Cathleen A. Springer
Reviews.Content: This camera makes still and video photo taking a snap [you should pardon the expression ;)] Uploading to the computer is also really simple. The quality of the 16 MP is terrific.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Beverly A. Horner "Thistle and Sun Studios"
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic product.  I love using it.  The picturers are clear, it is easy to use and I would recommend using this dealer anytime.

Reviews.Title: Like Nikon Cameras
Reviews.Author: Pamela Ballantine
Reviews.Content: I love the ease at which I can use this Coolpix camera,  The lens stuck and Im disappointed becasue it is the second Coolpix Ive purchased that this has happened to.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: sewnewss8
Reviews.Content: I've had this for several years now.  It is a great camera, easy to use, and takes great pictures.  Fits perfectly in the case I purchased for it.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jason "J"
Reviews.Content: nice camera for the price, bought a used one and was happy. Still trying to learn it the camera, quality of movies and pictures are fair to good. auto focus is a little loose, but ok

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the pocket or purse.
Reviews.Author: joyful "Joy"
Reviews.Content: It's small and light and takes moving shots that my iphone can't. The info on it is easy to read and implement.

Reviews.Title: Good Quick and Tiny
Reviews.Author: C. Myers
Reviews.Content: Loved the idea to not have to buy batteries!  Now can just charge it like so many other electronics of today.  Holds a charge for a very long time and doesn't take long to recharge.  Only negative I would mentioned is slight difficulty taking the sd card out, but could just be me.  Wish the buttons were more easily identified, so if you don't use it regularly, it might be necessary to get the booklet out each time when using.  It is small enough to drop in a pocket but large enough to be able to grip comfortably.  Would recommend it to anyone of any age to use.  Great close ups if using to take photos of items for sale on the web.

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: Excellent little camera, good still zoom, no problems.  I use it as a professional Home Inspector, so it gets heavy use.  Only thing I don't like, is in video mode, cannot zoom.

Reviews.Title: lasted only a few months
Reviews.Author: redheadsoup
Reviews.Content: we purchased this camera for my son from a local store. He used it twice.  a few months later we went to use it and found the view screen stopped working. I tried to find an answer on the net and found that this is a common problem with this camera.  I tried to find an answer on fixing it but could not, rumor of a recall but could not confirm it. We are very disappointed with this camera.  I will not purchase another nikon product.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sweete A
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my guy and he simply loved it! The purple color is beautiful and it takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S3300 16 MP Digital Camera with 6x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens
Reviews.Author: Katelyn
Reviews.Content: I will start off by saying this isn't a bad camera, for the price you pay its decent, it does have errors and problems, specially with the lens, I have had to warrentee mine 3 times, It sort of easy to use, but it does have a more complicated and extensive features great for people who know how to use them, bad for people who don't. Comes in great colors, easy to travel with you.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, but watch out for battery problems
Reviews.Author: J. Mcshane "Joe McShane"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I was fed up with having to replace AA batteries in other cameras.  This camera has a Li-ion rechargeable battery, which is great.  However, one thing you have to watch out for is that if you don't use the camera for a few days, the battery will discharge and you will get the message 'battery exhausted'.  I don't think you can do anything apart from buying a new battery when this happens - once the battery is exhausted, it will not recharge.  If you buy one of these cameras, you must always make sure you use it regularly (don't go without using for more than two days) and you must always ensure there is a charge in the battery (don't let it run out).

Reviews.Title: Small enough to always have it with you
Reviews.Author: johnphotographer
Reviews.Content: Got this for our daughter last Christmas - she always carries it - she has 2 larger cameras - but are bulky and not easily transported for a day trip.  This little one does the job

Reviews.Title: Compact & Simple
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Eamigh
Reviews.Content: For the price, I found the Coolpix S3300 camera a great buy. Its size, simplicity of operation and quality of pictures makes this camera a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: BriMarie
Reviews.Content: Great camera, battery life lasts and it holds a good amount of pictures. Has really good quality and is easy to use plus light weight!

Reviews.Title: Quit after a year!
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: Had this camera for a little over a year and it quit working right in the middle of taking pictures of a school Christmas program. Very disappointed! Would not buy another.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Daydreamer "Keep calm and be a dreamer."
Reviews.Content: This thing is amazing. It takes beautiful pictures even indoor in poor lights. It is a little hard to hold it still enough not to blur the pics but you can use the sports setting. I love the panorama pictures and hd video.

Reviews.Title: Simple yet great!
Reviews.Author: Linda Johnson
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband to take on his hunting and fishing trips.  He loves it and it gets used for about everything!  For a cheaper camera it has worked well.  We just plug it in when the battery gets low and we have not had to replace the battery yet.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Victor Yee
Reviews.Content: i did buy this camera dic-2012, and until now it has been working perfectly, it was purchased as a christmas gift for my 8 years old girl and until now no problems found on this camera, the camera is not used in a daily basis, but it has been used very often, and being used for an 8 years old child, that is quite a challenge for this camera !!I would recomend if you dont need a DSLR camera

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Nanners
Reviews.Content: My grand daughter was thrilled with this camera when she received it. She takes everywhere. She has become a good photographer. She is looking forward to printing some of the pictures she has taken for art purposes. I would buy this camera again.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Dani S.
Reviews.Content: very good camera, not used to all the functions, as long as you read the booklet that came with it, you're good.  Very helpful or I wouldn't have found half the features it has. Good zoom feature, good quality photos

Reviews.Title: good camera.
Reviews.Author: T. moore
Reviews.Content: I like it over all, but it takes a few seconds to load picture in screen after taking but other than that it takes great pictures indoors and out and nighttime pictures are great!

Reviews.Title: Very bad
Reviews.Author: Alice J. Drake
Reviews.Content: I have only had it one year and the lens cover won't open. Of course, the warranty just ran out. I won't have another.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera - takes good pictures
Reviews.Author: Marilee Spitsnogle
Reviews.Content: This is  nice small camera with clear photos and lots of options.  I wanted something easy with good photos and video capability.  This fits the bill nicely.  Bought one for my daughter as well.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, but camera is very fragile.
Reviews.Author: Eric R
Reviews.Content: Great pictures, but too fragile.This was the second Mikon compact I bought and although the pictures look great, the camera breaks easily.

Reviews.Title: worst point and shoot cam
Reviews.Author: Arun9
Reviews.Content: I should have stuck to canon. This was a big disappointment. Bad photos in low light and shutter lag is quite a lot for a quick casual pic. Auto focus doesnt work properly when there are two objects, one near and one far. Agreed that not much can be expected in a point and shoot but this is by far the worst point and shoot I ever used. The small form factor is only advantage with this. small enough to easily carry around.

Reviews.Title: Sharp images
Reviews.Author: reno,nv "shoegal"
Reviews.Content: Good cheep camera. I use it all the time to record ideas, document my work. In the past, my coolpix's have broken in a year and a half or two, but the images are very sharp, so it's worth it to have a 'throw away camera'. (This one purchased in Aug for Burningman and it still works.)

Reviews.Title: nikon camera
Reviews.Author: william barrios
Reviews.Content: all ok good excellent care is a reliable product and recommend it 100% sure I've used it and really work great thank you very much for your attention

Reviews.Title: Disgusted recipient
Reviews.Author: Susan Parker
Reviews.Content: I am so disgusted with this product. It came in a beat up box. I plugged it in to charge the battery and the charger doesn't work. The lens is scratched on the outside and the camera looks like it got hit by a truck. I will never order from this place again. I will also never order refurbished. It isn't worth the extra savings if it doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: I would recommend for the price
Reviews.Author: Eric M. Rohosky
Reviews.Content: Few complaints..took it to Disney and it performed well. Some shots took a little time to focus but otherwise a good camera. A few of my shots were blurry but that may have been my fault by not giving it enough time to focus.

Reviews.Title: Nice inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: gcbgold
Reviews.Content: Works great for an inexpensive camera.  Takes nice pictures. Easy to use.  Have had it for months and no problems.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Jane E.
Reviews.Content: I puirchased this camera after reading reviews and thought I could handle it being 80. I just use it for family gatherings and do not abuse it. Never left my house. However, the one big moment I wanted a camera was for when I volunteered at the Wounded Warriors galA inTexas with my 2 daughters and granddaughter and guess what it did not work would not focus. Now that was a once in a lifetime event for which I had no camera. Mind you I had already returned it once at my expense, they repaired it, no explanation of what was fixed, so now this is the second return, at my expense again, this time they gave an explanation that the focus needed to be repaired. so In four mos I have returned it twice at my expense. I emailed them my concerns,no response, so wrote them a physical letter over a month ago and no response to that either. So for mE and my family we all agre say this is a loser. If a company this large does not respond to their customers concerns I for one think they don't derserve my business ever again.My family will not buy their products either and I will continue to tell everyone that asks it is a pc of junk

Reviews.Title: Perfect little camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy Eaton "ne1054"
Reviews.Content: Compact, Fits in my purse, easy to operate and focus is nice. Replaced my old camera that was a Nikon Cool Pix. Just a different model. Love it!!

Reviews.Title: Not terrible, but not great either.
Reviews.Author: Ddee
Reviews.Content: It's alright for the price, I'm not completely thrilled, it is slow when trying to look at pictures onthe camera screen.  One thing I really don't like is that usually when you take a pictureyou can look on the screen and see the picture right away, on this camera you actuallyhave to wait a couple of seconds, push a button so you can look at the pic, then push anotherbutton to go back to picture taking mode, to me that is a total pain because you want to seeright away if the picture is good enough or if you should take another one.  Oh, the zoom is notreally all that, it doesn't zoom all that much.  Some pictures I've taken with this camera have comeout great but it does have a lot of little things that are kind of annoying.

Reviews.Title: Loved the color!
Reviews.Author: Wanda S. Wilson
Reviews.Content: My daughter in law loved the camera.  The only thing she has a problem sometimes with the picture going very blurry.

Reviews.Title: Thanks for the great camera...
Reviews.Author: D. Hogg "Dee RN"
Reviews.Content: This thin little camera is awesome. Does exactly what the seller listed. It is easy to carry and fits in my pocket. Got some great shots of the lovely fall leaves in our area.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Frierson
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for a month because my friend borrowed it and then lost it. However, the month I did have it, I loved it. It has a feature to take pictures in black and white, but it filters out one color. So, you could, for instance, put on red lipstick & choose to filter red. Then take the picture and your face will be black and white but your lips will be red. Very cool feature. It also has a very long battery life. VERY IMPORTANT TO ME. great product.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: dean
Reviews.Content: Nice replacement for the camera the locked up on me and, so I had to get a replacement stuck With Nikon CoolPix and it does OK job for $80

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Lindsay Lanczynski
Reviews.Content: I love Nikon and this is a great buy for a very affordable price. The pictures are very clear and the zoom works wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Wrong color!!
Reviews.Author: Glen Jensen
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine, my wife needs it for school. Problem is it's NOT PINK! The picture of the camera I purchased very clearly shows a pink camera and I received a silver camera.  Now my wife needed it for school, so she's okay.  But I am very unsatisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: Gemia August
Reviews.Content: Got it for my grandma to take to Rome, she loves how beautiful the pictures come out and how light weight it is. She stillis trying to learn all the features, butshe loves it. It was packaged great, came quickly and has a warranty

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S3300 16 MP Digital Camera w/6x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens
Reviews.Author: Terrel E Chappell
Reviews.Content: Great camera, good packaging. I love the compactness of the camera, but it takes wonderful pictures and also great videos.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Abbegirl
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a digital camera. I definitely picked the right one for my first! This is an awesome camera, especially for someone who has no experience with cameras. I'm still learning about all the features, but for point and click it's great! I have a tremor that causes my hands to shake, but you could never tell by looking at my pictures. That's an even bigger plus!

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa Orr "Heels Fan in Kenya"
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with all of the Nikon Cool Pix cameras I have had. These are great products, and I enjoy using them.

Reviews.Title: I love the camera!
Reviews.Author: Arthenia Bolden
Reviews.Content: I would have like to receive an owners manual in English. How can I get one? Is it possible to download one?

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: SaraG2003
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, durable, easy to use, thankful I found it for a great price!  Ordered it at last minute and it came very quickly.

Reviews.Title: good camera, excellent picture
Reviews.Author: ravi
Reviews.Content: - Good point and shoot camera- sharp and crisp pictures- zoom feature not much impressive but that's okay- worth the price-Recommended

Reviews.Title: Probably too many pixels for everyday's pics to e-mail
Reviews.Author: Isabel from Paraguay
Reviews.Content: I had to fix it with half definition because it took a lot  of room in my archives in the computer. I will reserve all its full definition for very special pics, not to send by e-mail, too big. Very good, and I know I still do not use it at its full. I will learn more.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Everton G.Hylton
Reviews.Content: My favourite shade is pink . Especially fuschia .I have a lot of things that are pink . I am 43 yrs old by the way. So anything pink I will buy . But back to the camera it take great pics , very clean and clear, great resolution.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: michelle shiever
Reviews.Content: Gift for my husband.  He loves it-nice and small with great pictures..................highly recomended.  what more can I say?  thank you

Reviews.Title: Picture quality excellent...
Reviews.Author: Colleen R.
Reviews.Content: This is actually the THIRD of this exact model I bought in 12 months.  I accidentally broke the LED display about a week after using the first one, having placed the camera and my cell phone in a small camera case.  I do wish the camera had come with some kind of protection to prevent that from happening.  The broken camera continued to take beautiful pictures and actually was fun to use because of the "blind" point and shoot.  I bought a second camera almost immediately and enjoyed having double the batteries, cords, etc. to keep both charged and let the broken one be my "back up" for the good one.  The reason I had to buy a third was that my daughter accidentally tried to charge each of the cameras and unknowingly forced a KODAK camera charger cord into the ports on both, which made them both unable to charge and the one with the unbroken display would show nothing.  So now I have one working camera with three batteries, sets of cords, etc...  Hard lessons learned.  I now wrap my cameras in an old sock to protect the display and my daughter learned to NEVER FORCE any electronic connections.  I think it stinks that the electronic industry continues to require all different sizes of batteries and does not have universal ports to charge devices.  I would have purchased an updated model the third time but felt I had invested so much into the extra batteries and cords of the broken cameras and will be fiercely protective of this third camera!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Jeannie Mannino
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes nice clear pics for the money. Light enought that I just carry in my purse al the time.

Reviews.Title: Cute Camera
Reviews.Author: Danielle Byers
Reviews.Content: This camera is such a cute color and really easy to use.I don't have any complaints about this camera.It shipped here on time and was easy to put together and use.I bought it just to capture my son's first years of life and it's perfect for that.

Reviews.Title: Love Coolpix
Reviews.Author: SavvyShopper
Reviews.Content: This is about our 4th coolpix throughout 10 yrs or so, we love our cool pix, you may wonder why so many?...well one drowned, the others just couldn't take the abuse of falling any more and we are talking on average having them for about 5 plus yrs, I can say we got our money's worth, price is right so is the shipping cost, very happy campers ;0)

Reviews.Title: Expectations Not Met
Reviews.Author: intheWood
Reviews.Content: Usually I would not hesitate in purchasing a Nikon product but I am not completely happy with this purchase. I find that the battery life is very limited. I would not select another camera without a eyepiece viewer in addition to the digital viewer. When in full sun I cannot make out the image being recorded in the viewfinder. It's a "I guess I got what I wanted" in the picture. Otherwise the quality is exceptional and I certainly would purchase another Nikon camera model that more closely met my criteria.

Reviews.Title: This camera was exactly what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Barbara ortiz
Reviews.Content: Extremely lightweight, easy to carry in my purse.  Easy to use, and it takes really sharp photos. I love it !!

Reviews.Title: great point & shot camera
Reviews.Author: Dog Walker 7
Reviews.Content: I used it for the first time yesterday & I was amazed how simple it was to use.  Pictures came out great.  Definitely recommend this camera for someone someone who basically just what's to take pictures without all the fuss

Reviews.Title: Warranty in USA?????
Reviews.Author: Richard Gariepy
Reviews.Content: I ordered the camera and it arrived 2 days early. I like that. The contents of the box did NOT contain any USA warranty card and the service/warranty information in the box was for Europe in several European languages. When I went to the Nikon website to register the camera a notice came back stating the product may be "gray market". Let's hope the camera doesn't break. Oh yea, the pictures are great and the camera is fully featured and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: headline
Reviews.Author: Kathy Souza
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera.  It is so much easier to carry and handle than the one I had before.  I loved howed it helped center the person or persons faces when taking the picture.  The pictures came out great.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Xadius Heard
Reviews.Content: I did not want an expensive camera considering I would only use it to take 720p videos for Youtube so this camera is just what I needed. Takes great pictures, small, inexpensive, and again 720p video!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sunni
Reviews.Content: Can't beat this camera for the price. It is easy to use and takes great pictures. I like the extra options it has and has delivered just what I wanted in a point and shoot camera

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: Corby S Achierno
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera for my son to use on our recent cruise to the Caribbean.  It was perfect and worked great for him.  For being so small and compact, it took great pictures.  Well worth the money we spent!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not what I really expected
Reviews.Author: GT
Reviews.Content: I wanted to replace an old NIKON 8MP so I went with this oneI should have spent a little bit more money and I think I would have gotten something betterYou have to keep the flash on all the time if not the autofocus will not work and all your pictures will be flurry

Reviews.Title: Good Price good camera
Reviews.Author: Johannes B
Reviews.Content: For the $100 I payed for this camera it's really great.the batterie lasts long enough for 1-2 days of taking picures.Sometimes the Auto Focus doesn't work very well but if you try it a few times it will work again.I can recomend this camera to everybody but if you want good pictures of the distance I would recomend a better camera.

Reviews.Title: great for my mom
Reviews.Author: glorybe
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a present for my mom, who is not tech savvy and a little forgetful.  She is able to take great pictures with it.  She loves the red color and small size to fit in her purse and the large viewing area.  Great price, too.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: yvonne
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a great price. I've enjoyed using this camera on my nature walks. The instruction manual has been helpful with some of the settings.

Reviews.Title: Great  camera
Reviews.Author: Jeanne
Reviews.Content: Great camera,great pics on my vacation! Really good price too. Very happy with this. Also had video that works with audio .

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: Janell D Alcott
Reviews.Content: when I first purchased this camera I thought it was great, however it's not performing like I think it should. I would spend a little more money next time and get a better camera.  I do love Nikon, just not this particular camera.

Reviews.Title: Worked great until it broke
Reviews.Author: David P.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my girlfriend. She loved it and it worked great for about 3 months. The camera was taken very good care of and never dropped. The camera still turns on and seems to function normally but the screen just shows black and it will not take pictures. Overall, very disappointing :(.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: robert nelson
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with the camera, it works great! We will use you again in the future. Thanks much

Reviews.Title: what a great coolpix
Reviews.Author: Palmira Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I love the why it takes picture took it to the beach the pic. were so clear so i give this coolpix s3300 five stars!!

Reviews.Title: Pics
Reviews.Author: Tereza Marinho
Reviews.Content: It is a very good camera for the price. Simple to use, simple to download. I recommend it to everyone looking for a simple and good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Jane Martin
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a camera that would take a picture that I didn't have to "focus" and basically worked for a novice like me. I have tried many and sent them back .My son in law had this camera and I took it with me to the Grand Canyon. It was easy to use and took really good pictures, so I bought one. It has a lot of features that you can learn to use but I haven't done that yet so can't comment on that. For just taking pictures and zooming onto a subject you can't beat this for the price.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Anedra Collier
Reviews.Content: very good price for the quality, nice and sleek design, takes very good pictures and my hand trembles a little.

Reviews.Title: LOVE my little camera!
Reviews.Author: Wanda Durost
Reviews.Content: I am giving this camera a 5 star because I have nothing bad to say about it! Love the price, the size, ease of use, takes great pictures.....would recommend it for anyone!

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Scott Nelson
Reviews.Content: It's light, it's compact, and takes wonderful pictures. I recommend this camera to everyone, I take it everywhere I go.

Reviews.Title: Great for both photos and movies.
Reviews.Author: John M. Gillroy "John Martin Gillroy"
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic camera, light, potable, with great optics and is very reliable. I wish it came with a print owners manual...JMG

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Brent Del Pino "hat man"
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera.  The only thing is that I did not receive the lanyard nor the charger.  The price was exceptionally good

Reviews.Title: Amazing little camera for great price
Reviews.Author: Theresa Lodise
Reviews.Content: I have been participating in an online photography class and purchased this camera after my old camera broke. I like the Nikon Coolpix series because they are lightweight, easy to operate and convenient for me to use despite my physically disability. I have been amazed at the numerous features in this camera that I have learned to use through my class. Although my old camera probably possessed similar features I did not yet have the skill/knowledge to fully appreciate them. This camera has offered me new surprises everyday as I learn new things and explore/practice accessing/using the subtle adjustments/settings/features. If I have anything at all negative to say it would be that the camera has turned on at times when I have accidentally pressed the button while it was in the case, in my purse or on a strap around my neck. This concerns me because this sort of thing can result in a "lens error" which can jam the lens and subsequently destroy the camera. These "lens error" issues are in fact what meant the end of my two previous Nikons and are very common in the Coolpix series. Despite this I still have found them to be the best cameras for me.

Reviews.Title: work
Reviews.Author: Barbara Spicer
Reviews.Content: this was bought for work and the security team is using it very day and now I can take mine back

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT CHARGE.
Reviews.Author: Jessie
Reviews.Content: I am so disappointed with this camera. It records all right in HD, especially for the price.But after about four months of buying this camera brand new, it stopped charging. I even bought a new charger, but still, it would not charge. And Sony customer service is awful. Don't waste your money on this. Nikon has some great cameras, but this one is definitely not one of them. Opt for a pricier camera that is better quality.

Reviews.Title: nikor S3300 digital camera
Reviews.Author: mokihana
Reviews.Content: Love it!  It allows me to be a really good photographer, which I am not.  The pictures I took on my Alaska cruise came out really clear.  I didn't have that much time to practice with the camera before my cruise, but now intend to take a lot of pictures.It is just small enough that I can put it in my purse or hang it from the strap of purse.  Not heavy, easily portable.

Reviews.Title: Review of new camera
Reviews.Author: Franklin
Reviews.Content: It is compatible with the software from previous purchase and also with the older editing program I use. The previous Nikon had a problem with the gearing for the lens and would lock up. After the third time I purchased this new one at a lesser cost than the cost of fixing the lens on my old one. Its a good camera, adequate for my purposes.

Reviews.Title: Everything I Needed
Reviews.Author: ychuck46
Reviews.Content: Lightweight and portable, good resolution at 16MP, intuitive menu, and a good price.  All in all a very good value.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the buy
Reviews.Author: Prasad Nagaraja
Reviews.Content: I got this 2 weeks back and it has been doing good so far. Its a good value for the money. Basic camera with no special features.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for that price
Reviews.Author: Ivaylo P.
Reviews.Content: Does descent pictures and shoots HD movie. I't easy to operate. Pull it out of your pocket turn it on shoot pic/vid turn it off and to the pocket again. For a camera under 100$ is a good value. Comes with no 40Mb+ storage, so SD card is a must. But I guess that's common among cameras of this range.The optical zoom is a nice addition although I don't care much about that feature.Nice compact design and useful.I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Good basic camera
Reviews.Author: Yen
Reviews.Content: Nikon is suppose to have good products but this camera doesn't have good image quality, I have a Samsung and it takes better pictures than this Nikon, I don't know if it's because this model is a basic camera

Reviews.Title: Arrived on-time and excellant shape
Reviews.Author: AZGUY
Reviews.Content: The camera replaced a Samsung 10mp unit that was damaged in a wreck. It worked well and was charged when it arrived. I like the unit and gave it to my stepdaughter for her use and to replace the broken unit.

Reviews.Title: soft pics, grainy vids.
Reviews.Author: Odn "Odn"
Reviews.Content: I would probably go 3.5, but 4 is ok, because I picked it up in good shape rather cheap.  Some of the pics are ok, some awful. Some of the video is ok, anything past 20 ft seems really grainy.  I think I was expecting something better than my old Coolpix P60 before I ruined it....not so: the P60 took much better video indoors and out (and not even HD) and pics. Some of the pics are good, though and this camera is far more compact.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pics
Reviews.Author: Nicole Andrea Baptist
Reviews.Content: This Nikon Coolpix  takes really great pictures. Its my favorite color. Simple to use and light weight. The only thing that would make it better is if it were waterproof!

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera but.....
Reviews.Author: Scott Matthew Fine
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice camera. I got it for my girlfriend and she loves it except for one issue. It takes VERY slow pictures. When you press the button it takes a few seconds to to take the picture Then it takes quite some time to save the picture and prep it for another picture. Just don't expect it to take a lot of pictures fast and you will be fine.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a point and shoot.  has a lot of nice features.  battery holds up pretty well. Good value.

Reviews.Title: A great little camera
Reviews.Author: J. Emborsky
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use and the photos are first class. I highly recommend it and would buy another for myself or as a gift.

Reviews.Title: great camera..
Reviews.Author: Krissie
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera and the HDE case.. great pairing.  Camera is easy to use and manual is 'user friendly'I am not a pro, but this camera provided me with great pix and videos.  Recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: coolpix S3300
Reviews.Author: richard e chestnut
Reviews.Content: As expected, purchased a newer model to replace a older model that got damaged, will purchase again in the future

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Matilda G Allen
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera and the price is right. I am very happy with my purchase. Pictures are great and anyone can use it. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix3300
Reviews.Author: Stingray662
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife because of the color.  Color of camera is great, battery and sd card access door is cheap plastic and I wonder how long it will last.  Camera seems to take good pics for a quickie camera.

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous camera
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing, its a lot better than my old Nikon Coolpix. It takes perfect pictures and has so many settings and all you have to do is charge the battery, instead of constantly buying new ones. And it was shipped really fast.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lois A.Rose
Reviews.Content: Takes the best pictures ever for such a small camera. It takes great action shots with no blurring---stops everything in mid motion, even my grandson.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this camera for the deal!I remember when I spent hundreds of dollars to get a 5 megapixel camera...no longer necessary!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Calla "Calla"
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures! Small and compact, so it doesn't take up a lot of space. This is for the people who want a great camera without spending at least $600. Great for the price, compact, and easy to use. Is great indoor and outdoor.

Reviews.Title: Item damaged upon receipt
Reviews.Author: kristine will
Reviews.Content: I have the same camera, so I ordered one for my husband.  I like the Nikon COOLPIX S3300, however, when we received our product, the screen was distorted/damaged.  We had to return it the same day.  We did however place another order for the red NIKON COOLPIX S6300.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, beautiful and clear photos!
Reviews.Author: Amalia Armijo
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this for a trip because my old camera broke. I was much more familiar with Kodak Easyshare cameras but this Nikon was easy to learn. The menus are simple, and it's easy to charge. There are so many various settings to chose, but I found if I leave it in auto, it takes perfect photos all the time. The timer is easy to use as well. Overall, I've had no problems and have been very happy with it. I've had it almost 2 months and it held up very well on my vacation. Love the beautiful pink color, too.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Maria V Reynolds
Reviews.Content: i purchased one for myself and had to get another for my daughter.  She loves taking pictures.  Good resolution great price!

Reviews.Title: About this camera
Reviews.Author: gopal
Reviews.Content: I like this camera, pictures are clear,battery life good. easy sharing and processing. very light and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: snicklebooper
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter's 13 birthday and she loves the fun color.  I love what you get for the price.  She is able to take great pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: It was just what I was looking for - not to small and not to big  - the pictures are clear as a bell better then my old one they came in too fuzzy - thank you it's the bomb

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: debra balfanz
Reviews.Content: I got it for my daughter to use for school. She tells me she really likes it. So I might get me one too.

Reviews.Title: great cam
Reviews.Author: marlon
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera . It take wonderful pictures and video. i recommend it as a cheap and effective camera

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3300
Reviews.Author: Charles M
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures. The only downside is it does not have a view finder and you must depend on the led screen. In bright sun it is sometimes hard to see. It is a nice size and easy to carry in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: 2SF
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 9 year old.  This camera takes AMAZING pictures!  I shoot with a Canon Rebel and am truly amazed at the quality of photos that comes from this little pocket sized camera (at a fraction of the price). : It even takes video!Only downside is that it did not come with a memory card or camera case which required an extra trip to the store.

Reviews.Title: Great product as a gift
Reviews.Author: Self Review
Reviews.Content: I have purchased to gift it to my colleague on his wedding...I am sure he will love this gift and the snaps he will take on his honeymoon tour...shhhhh!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Digital Camera.
Reviews.Author: Judith A. Foley
Reviews.Content: One of the best camera's out there.  I have no problems uploaded my pictures unto the internet.  This is  a very easy step.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Veronica Mendoza
Reviews.Content: The camera is good.  It does look a bit cheap but takes good pictures.  For the price I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Average Camera
Reviews.Author: Sarah Kretschmer
Reviews.Content: This is just your average point and shoot camera.Nothing extremely special when it comes to a camera!But well worth the money

Reviews.Title: Very Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Billy W. Kiggins
Reviews.Content: Well review readers ,  just so you know I am a 69 year old man that has had considerable experience in photography.And without getting into a bunch of confusing details the S3300 is a very good camera .  I can be a very critical personon evaluating anything .  However for the price of this camera you can not go wrong .  99 percent of the time settingeverything on automatic will give you very good results . But when you do want to it is surprisingly controlable also .Just take the time to familiarize yourself with the controls which is very easy to do and you will enjoy this little gem .  As always , thank you Amazon for prompt service .  Have a Great day folks !  Billy  Kiggins

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S3300 16 MP Digital Camera with 6x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens and 2.7-inch LCD (Silver)
Reviews.Author: pollygirl51
Reviews.Content: Love it! Althought I'm still learning how to use it. So far I have taken a few pictures of my daughters pets and the pictures are great.

Reviews.Title: Great Color and size
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Beautiful color, the camera is really compact and easy to carry, easy to use, depending on the type of scene photographs are excellent, real good colors, flash really does its job, I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Robert B.
Reviews.Content: the nikon coolpix s3300 is awesome i have it. it's cheap but takes outstanding pictures and awesome HD 720p videos

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Osiris
Reviews.Content: Excelente cámara! Tal cual descrita... Recomendado 100  % / Excellent camera! As is described ... Recommended 100% Five star .

Reviews.Title: Mom has arrived in the future
Reviews.Author: Cole Carson
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mom for X-mas because it was definitely time she had a digital camera. It works great & is super user friendly

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Jimbob
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just before I went on a cruise. I now have pictures and videos of a great trip.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: zeke12
Reviews.Content: My last camera finally died so I replaced it with this and can't be happier.  Size, quality, pictures.  I appreciate the rechargeable battery, too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Mrs. P
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a small, lightweight camera to carry around in my purse.  I haven't figured out all of the modes yet, but it seems to work fantastic.  I get tons of attention on facebook with every picture that I take with this camera.  The colors are crisp and bright.  Pictures are clear.  It's only problem so far seems to be large groups in crappy lighting (think indoor school choir concert).  Too many faces for it to focus on and that icky stage lighting that is very good at ruining photos.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Carrie kuhaupt
Reviews.Content: This small camera is just as good as its bigger companion, I would recomend to anyone who wants a small one.

Reviews.Title: It takes good pictures but feels alittle on the flimsy side.
Reviews.Author: nancy
Reviews.Content: I have not tried all the features but for basic picture taking, the pictures are crisp and the zoom is great. It is easy to put the pictures onto the computer too and took only minutes to figure out which, for me a huge technophobe, was a delight! It does feel abit on the flimsy side and I would be afraid to drop it. The zoom button is easy to work but still I get the feeling that if you do it too quickly, the buttom might come right off. This may sound silly but the color may have something to do with it too as if you got a silver one, you think "metal, durability" I purchased the 2 year accident plan just in case.

Reviews.Title: No Regrets!
Reviews.Author: Nodrog
Reviews.Content: I've always liked Nikon cameras the qualities of the pictures are superb. I have No regrets for choosing this brand camera.

Reviews.Title: Whole fam love it...
Reviews.Author: larry benard
Reviews.Content: so cool camera, easy to shoot , love it ...repeat Nikon customers..will buy again, so easy for the whole family.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Russell J. Knisley
Reviews.Content: for the price, it rocks......easy to use, light and fun. worked like a champ right out of the box. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Crystal Spradlin
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I expected. I love it! Great quality for a great price! Saved about $40.00 on it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: donisha harris
Reviews.Content: its small and easy to use and the flash don't have you seeing spots lol time to fill up the picture books

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camer That Fits the Budget!
Reviews.Author: Youlanda Henry
Reviews.Content: The one downer? No extra battery. And since it doesn'y use regular old alkaline, that can be a bummer depending on where you are. But still, amazing.Crisp pictures, even in low light.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Its small easy to carry around and a great starter camera. I like the picture for how small it is and it works well.

Reviews.Title: great camera, it's a Nikon. Enough said
Reviews.Author: Mick
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for my mother as a Christmas present and she loves it.  The camera is great and takes fanastic pictures.

Reviews.Title: cámara
Reviews.Author: Naicols Silva
Reviews.Content: Excelente. Continuaré comprando a este vendedor. Tienda recomendada para hacer más compras internacionales. GRACIAS POR LA VENTA DEL PRODUCTO. SALUDOS

Reviews.Title: Good camera.  Great price
Reviews.Author: Barry Alan "bartsky"
Reviews.Content: A good camera for the price I paid.  I had an earlier model that took nice photos, so I thought I would try the upgrade.  Basically the same camera.  It is very portable and fits in a pocket, so it is easy to take along anywhere.  The zoom could be clearer, but no real complaints.  It helps to read the instructions and learrn how to set the camera for best results.  Overall a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: design
Reviews.Author: harvey dinkin
Reviews.Content: quality of product and ease of use make this item ideal to carry and travel with plus the size is perfect

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: B. Barnes
Reviews.Content: The shutter speed is too slow, so many pictures end up blurry or misses what I intended to capture. It was a good price, but the constant repeat pictures aren't worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Duke
Reviews.Content: Got this for our daughter (8yrs) as a beginner's camera. Works great and is easy to use. She loves it, plus its pink!

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera
Reviews.Author: S.Rod
Reviews.Content: I got for my oldest daugther for Christmas. She love it, uses it alot for pictures and videos for her kids school games and activities.

Reviews.Title: Love it but have to keep replacing
Reviews.Author: TomKat
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me this camera for Christmas because we got a new grandchild. I love the camera and it takes great pictures, however we had the first one 31 days and it would not turn on. We took it back to Best Buy and they replaced it. Exactly 30 days later, the exact same thing happened. We are taking it back for a different camera.

Reviews.Title: It's really good!!!
Reviews.Author: Liziane
Reviews.Content: I love the size, the facilities, the battery lifetime and the quality of the pictures and videos. It's really easy to use!

Reviews.Title: re my camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa Sorenson
Reviews.Content: It works great, easy to use and understand and was descent price. Everythiong is easy with this camera even down to carryong it with you, it doesnt take any space at all but is always there if you need it.

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Patricia Greenleaf
Reviews.Content: The camera was a good buy.  Not the best camera I ever owned but it serves the purpose.  I'm not a professional photographer so it works for me.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: evilidcat
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. Easy to use. Easy to carry. Just a all around basic nice little camera. No need to pay a fortune for something basic.

Reviews.Title: good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Elisabetta Girardi
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good deal for the price, but it's not the easiest one to use... if you give it to your kid (like I did) without many explanations, most of the pictures will come out blurry!

Reviews.Title: Blurry photos, then display cracked
Reviews.Author: Patti Margarita
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for $42 on Amazon during the holidays for my daughter because it looked like a great camera for the price. I am used to a Canon 5d Mark II. The images are not crisp, so I am not sure where the image stabilization comes in. I have taken a few myself and if you are not sitting completely still and hold it for a few seconds after taking the photo, you get some blur.We had the camera on vacation with us this past week and had it in a case in a backpack and the display screen cracked. Since we only paid $42 for it, not going to pay to have it fixed. Now I come back and it is more than double the cost.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: L. Orazi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I want to take good close ups of nature and people. My Iphone camera does not give me the detail I was looking for and this camera fit the bill perfectly.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: dvmoore36
Reviews.Content: l love this nikon digital camera the fact that verything came with the camera didn't have to buy parts of this camera was great it work nothing was miss or broken just love it

Reviews.Title: all around good camera
Reviews.Author: Ted Kallas
Reviews.Content: The camera met my expectations. I'm very happy with it. It is a bit slow sometimes but none the less it works great.

Reviews.Title: Great easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: momof3
Reviews.Content: Santa brought this for our 7 year old.  It's a great camera, easy to use.  Bought a small memory card to go with it and she is all set.  Probably too nice for a 7 year old but the deal at Christmas was too good to pass by.  The cheap kid cameras aren't worth it.

Reviews.Title: My Camera is Cool
Reviews.Author: Alvin J. Mason
Reviews.Content: I must say that I am an amateur when it comes to camera's but this Nikon has not let me down. It has been easy to operate and easy to learn. I love the safety feature that shuts the camera down when it's not in use. I give it a three thumbs up. Well ok, two thumbs up since that all I have.

Reviews.Title: awesome busniess
Reviews.Author: Monica Schaller
Reviews.Content: this item didn't take anytime & it was around Christmas so that impressed me more..the camera is very nice

Reviews.Title: This is a great product
Reviews.Author: Rolando Gomez Rep. Dom.
Reviews.Content: Thank you for this great digital camera with very good performance and very nice and compact item.  I will to buy somethings more soon.

Reviews.Title: Small, Light, and Powerful
Reviews.Author: Charlee R Snow
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 6 days and have used it every day.I'm a bird watcher.  This camera doesn't have a long enough zoom to make it a really good bird watching camera, but it does come in handy for birds in flight.  I took it to the beach and got several high definition pictures of sea birds just lounging around (you could get withing about 8 feet of most beach birds before they spook).  Best of all, I got a number of pictures of birds in flight--the wide angle lens doing good work.I take pictures of small objects to sell over the internet.  It was easy to use the menu to change the picture mode to the low def needed for on-screen photos, and the macro feature worked flawlessly.From the experiences I've had so far, I'm sure this would be a good camera to take with me when I visit the grand-kids.The only thing missing is an optical viewfinder.  Outdoor, and especially bird-in-flight pictures, would go better with an optical viewfinder.If you want a cheap, versicle camera, you could do a lot worse.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use - affordable enough to leave at daycare
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: We bought one of these for our daycare center to use to take pictures of our kid so we don't miss what he does at daycare.  Works easy and pictures come out fairly clean.  Only complaint is red-eye tends to be prevalent in indoor pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: cheyenne
Reviews.Content: It's a basic digital camera, nothing fancy. But, still a wonderful little thing, let me tell ya!!! The pictures come out great. For the price, it's totally worth it.This would be a perfect camera for a teenager !!! ;}

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo
Reviews.Content: Really I have no words to express how pleased I am purchasing this product exceeded my expectations because I'm so very happy.

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED FROM NIKON
Reviews.Author: Thom
Reviews.Content: I bought a Nikon Coolpix 3300 because of its compact size and 16 megapixel resolution plus a 6x optical zoom. That's all I got. Slow to save a photo. I get tired of trying to take photos with it. Image stabilization is terrible. Most of the photos come out far less quality than I get with several Olympus point and shoots.

Reviews.Title: More for less!
Reviews.Author: Eddie Wright
Reviews.Content: his camera covers all of the basics for the average home photog, but also packs a few welcome additions sure to delight any enthusiast.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: agustin iglesia
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto. rapido facil y a tiempo la entrega. sin contratiempos en todo el proceso. lo recomiendo a a

Reviews.Title: Size of the camera and quality of the photos are good
Reviews.Author: Steven Mayer
Reviews.Content: Size of the camera and quality of the photos are good.  I like the live look of the scene in the LCD.

Reviews.Title: Love my Nikons
Reviews.Author: Jackie Carey
Reviews.Content: I have always used Nikons and this one lives up to its predecessors. Small, light, cool purple and easy to use. And the pictures are great.

Reviews.Title: A great product.
Reviews.Author: Vasanth
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my lab purposes. It works great and does all the basic needs. The images are crisp and clear and the auto focus works good. Definitely worth the price paid.

Reviews.Title: Love the size
Reviews.Author: Southern Girl "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: I just love the small size. It takes great pictures. There are 2 things that I'm disappointed in (1) the slow shutter speed and (2) no little paper manual to put in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Nice Crisp Shots but the Camera is Slow
Reviews.Author: Deborah A. Deal
Reviews.Content: I love the nice crisp shots I get with this camera.  The camera is very easy to use but other reviews are correct in stating that the camera is slow.... HOWEVER I think it is a great deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: Laurie Heath
Reviews.Content: My son and daughter in law are both very happy with their new camera!  Now I will hopefully get more pictures of my sweet grandson!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S3300 camera
Reviews.Author: Donn Latour
Reviews.Content: These cameras work really well in our office.  The order was received promptly and in good condition.  We would order again, if needed.

Reviews.Title: This is our 3rd Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Jodi Kaufman
Reviews.Content: This looks new and improved with more pixels and higher zoom. Seems sturdier than the last one where the lens mechanism failed.

Reviews.Title: Very solid product
Reviews.Author: Jason ERickson
Reviews.Content: This Camera works great for everything we need it for. It takes high quality picutres that can be used by engineers and quality inspection. Great product for the very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: MrEd
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific camera.  Takes great pics and has a ton of features you would expect on more expensive cameras.  I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Pocket
Reviews.Author: Luchita
Reviews.Content: It's a nice camera, easy to use and confortable. It takes good pictures and it arrived on time. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: handy little camera
Reviews.Author: happy
Reviews.Content: Used it on our vacation at the Grand Canyon's Polar Express.  Battery died out at the end of the evening, but we took a lot of pics throughout the day!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera.
Reviews.Author: S. Pandya
Reviews.Content: I already have a 16 MP Sony SLR camera but wanted one camera for daily use for picnics or parties. It is just uncomfortable to carry a large camera for small events where just the high-resolution image is important not the special effects or other frills. Overall just excellent camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Christmas for mom
Reviews.Author: YB
Reviews.Content: My mom came down for thanksgiving and her camera had a rubber bands around it holding it together. I bought this and she got it on christmas eve. She loves it and says the zoom on it is great.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: JOE MANCUSO
Reviews.Content: we love this camera we use it for work. takes great picture. We use this camera every day. my employees take about 100 or more photos per day. so far no issue's. they like that it is small and fits in top pocket.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera. Recommended
Reviews.Author: Gianny Josue Villarreal Bustos
Reviews.Content: Good product, the product was shipped in accordance with the provisions.the images are of good quality, It has good size, is lightweight. Recommended

Reviews.Title: gift for my niece
Reviews.Author: Marci Ramsey
Reviews.Content: this was a gift for my niece for Christmas, she is a Freshman in High School and has lots of dances and outings coming up. She squealed with joy when she opened it, and has been sending me pictures ever since.

Reviews.Title: Great camara
Reviews.Author: S. M. G.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 10 year old daughter for Christmas. It is a very easy to use point and shoot camera and it takes great pictures, she loves it! She even records small movies she makes on it. The size it great too, small enough to put in your pocket. The camera take a charge off of your computer instead of batteries, which is a nice feature and the charge seems to last long. Very happy with the quality and functions this camera provides for the price!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: Terri L. Skarsten "Terri"
Reviews.Content: We bought a Nikon Coolpix years ago and loved it. It was recently stolen, so we bought this one. We love it. Fabulous, clear pictures. Great viewing screen. Convenient size. We're extremely happy with this Nikon Coolpix. We were so pleased with our first Nikon Coolpix, that we knew we could count on this being a great replacement.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and high quality
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Brown
Reviews.Content: This Coolpix is really easy to use and takes great shots. Love that I can slip it into my pocket and carry everywhere I go.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Diana Stewart
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for myself.  I love the quality of the pictures and it is even better that it comes in pink.  Very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Cool pictures.
Reviews.Author: Rishi Mahangi
Reviews.Content: This camera hits the spot,it takes very good pictures ,the zoom is very good and for 16 mp the picture is worth 1000 words.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: tye
Reviews.Content: this little camera is as easy as it gets, just point and shoot, no s***, its true. takes really nice pictures too.

Reviews.Title: Paid for pink , got purple
Reviews.Author: danielle
Reviews.Content: I could not wait to finally get my new camera in the mail , but to my surpise there in the box was a purple camera . It was suppost to be pink , but I am not picky and will enjoy it anyways no matter color . Quality is good though , takes great pics and I love the zoom .

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto.
Reviews.Author: Abraham Jose Padilla VE10X1004
Reviews.Content: Este producto cumplió con las necesidades que se tenían, es de buena calidad, lo recibí en el indicado por el vendedor, recomiendo ampliamente al vendedor. Gracias por atención.

Reviews.Title: Pictures don't turn out as good as I thought they should .
Reviews.Author: Crowhunter
Reviews.Content: I thought it was a little to complicated to use ,I bought it for its small size but I can't get pictures to turn out as good as my old Kodak 6 Z650 .Bud Lawson

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: achristiefan
Reviews.Content: It's little but don't let the size fool you. It's got more features than the last 2 cameras I had. I keep it in my purse to have on hand for a special moment. It's just a tad bigger than my cell phone.

Reviews.Title: For my grandaughter
Reviews.Author: Luciann Arends
Reviews.Content: Was a Christmas present for my grandaught. She loved it and so far is working great. Was dellivered on time.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sebastián Costa
Reviews.Content: It will be perfect if the device has HDMI port (Maybe next time) anyway the camera takes excellent pictures and its very small (easy to transport)

Reviews.Title: coolpix
Reviews.Author: Freddie B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my dad.  He is a little behind the times and STILL does not have a decent cell phone with a decent camera on it (i.e. blackberry).  I got this for him for xmas and he loves it.  He wanted a simple-to-use camera that he can point and shoot.  He hunts a lot with his dog so it has helped him take great pictures.  He has yet to use the HD video recorder so I cannot review that feature.  Nikon is reputable brand so I went with it.

Reviews.Title: Good solid pocket camera
Reviews.Author: HMK
Reviews.Content: I've had one of these for about 5 years and have always used it with no problems...I recently purchased one for my son who is 9, for his first camera. He really likes it and seems to have learned how to use it fairly quickly!

Reviews.Title: Want to keep forever.
Reviews.Author: Yoshilyn
Reviews.Content: I'm no photographer, or anything, but I definitely LOVE the way this camera takes pictures. The images are crystal sharp, and does not compare at all to the last camera we had at the house. I love the brightness of it, and how great pictures come out when taken in the dark. The only thing I don't like about it is the lag the camera has after taking a picture. It takes about 5 secs so that the image can be stored into the camera and you have to wait. As  much as that bothers me, I don't mind it because the picture quality makes up for it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: RetirementRocks "CK"
Reviews.Content: This camera works well, and isn't too costly!  Has good ability to find faces.The small size means I'll carry it often in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: Good Camara
Reviews.Author: Luis Munguia
Reviews.Content: This is my second Nikon I own, good camera for the price. Amazon made the purchase to be very easy and fast. The camera has every thing a point and shoot must have.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: SCS
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an earlier model Coolpix camera.  The previous one worked very well also, but with two issues.  First, it went through batteries very quickly.  The older it got, the faster it went through them.  And secondly, the flash became inconsistent.  I don't know what is acceptable for a life span of this type of camera, but it was about 2 years on the previous one.  The price was pretty good on this, so I'm hoping to get a minimum of two years on this as well.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: JOY MARIA CAESAR
Reviews.Content: easy to use, great pictures, easy to carry, easy to connect to your PC or IPad and the quality of the product ranks supreme

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Whitney Sharp
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 8 year old daughter for Christmas.  She loves it!  It is a very nice, sturdy camera.  It takes great pictures and videos for the price.  It uses a rechargeable battery that is included.  It seems to last a reasonable amount of time.  We have had no problems with it, we just make sure to charge it at the end of every use.  I am very pleased with this camera and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: El movie watcher
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera it does everything we need it to do and more the resolution is great very clear pictures I would def recommend getting one

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Amanda M. Texido "Amanda"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to set up and use, and is the perfect size for my daughter, who loves to take pictures.  Great quality!

Reviews.Title: A good choice.
Reviews.Author: Toni Albert
Reviews.Content: The recipient, my granddaughter, was thrilled with the camera.  A perfect gift for a young teen wanting to learn about photography.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Dengineer
Reviews.Content: We were looking to replace an older, slower Nikon we owned.  We were a bit skeptical due to the price, but it turned out to be a great camera.  Quick response on turn-on, compared ot other cameras we looked at, which was it's most impressive feature.  Pictures were crisp and clear.  A fair amount of features and battery life is good.  We've had it about 3 weeks and so far, great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: I like it very much and would recommend it
Reviews.Author: Hattie Y. Riddick
Reviews.Content: It is a little smaller than I though it wold be, but it is very useful and what I really can handle.

Reviews.Title: Very nice

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality is a deal breaker
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera at another store for less than 75 dollars, and figured that for the price we would give it a try. I own a Canon Powershot Elph 310 HS and am a Canon fanatic, but I wanted to see what Nikon had to offer for a point and shoot. Having worked with a Nikon D3100 DSLR in the past, I was expecting decent results from their more affordable point and shoot line. However, after using this camera for only a day and a half, I returned it to the store and decided to get the Canon Powershot A2300 for the extra ten dollars. The main reason I returned this product was the picture quality; LOTS of noise in pictures EVEN with the flash on! It is practically impossible to take a picture with out the flash, and with the flash everything in the image is washed out. The straw that broke the camel's back was when I took a picture indoors with adequate lighting AND flash and the picture came out almost completely black:( The camera is also very slow, the time it takes for the camera to focus, take the picture etc is very long, and you are likely to miss the shot you are looking for. The build quality of the camera is attractive, and it is very small and compact, great size for your pocket or purse (one of the main reasons I purchased it)but that fact is irrelevant if your pictures all fail to turn out. Very dissapointed in this camera. For the money, the Canon is your best bet!Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image Stabilized Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle Lens with 720p HD Video Recording (Black)

Reviews.Title: Wrong item, right UPC code
Reviews.Author: A. Lindsey
Reviews.Content: I ordered this pink camera and received a silver one. It wasn't as if they simply grabbed the wrong item off the shelf. No. The box showed a silver camera on it. The pink camera comes in a box that shows a pink camera, the blue in a box showing a blue camera, etc. You get the idea. The problem was the UPC code for the silver camera had a new UPC sticker placed over the one printed on the box. The new sticker identified the camera as pink, even though the box shows a picture of a silver one. I returned it in exchange for another one. Guess what I got? Another silver one with a UPC sticker saying it is pink. Come on! They should know that the picture on the box corresponds to what is actually in it. So someone picks it out of the warehouse cause the label says it is pink and one of two things happen: they completely miss the fact that the picture shows a different color. Or worse, they DO realize the box shows a different color but figure that "the UPC sticker HAS to be right, no one could have possibly put the wrong sticker on it", and send it out anyway. Idiots! Pay attention and do your job right!
