Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift for my friend who was going on a cruise and did not have a camera.  So far, she seems to love it and says it is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Now if I can just keep it out of water........I really love it.  So compact and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Connie H.
Reviews.Content: Now if I can just keep it out of water...... I really love it.  So compact and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Yes
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This by far is one of the best cameras made. Got it for my teenage in and it takes the best pic ever

Reviews.Title: for all my needs:) love it
Reviews.Author: august
Reviews.Content: il just say for an average camera fair priced , to take pictures that you can actually see:) is like rechargable battery:) a plus lasted a full 6 hrs of charge maybe more i used it for 6 hrs first day . now  only thing il point out it the fact that i forgot to buy a memory card it holds only like 10 with out it , but still even after a card the fact that it takes pictures and no worry of the batterys every 5 snaps . ill say 5 stars  i wil be yousing it allot more ill have to repost how it goes:) il say worth the cash all the way!!! ty

Reviews.Title: llego muy rapido
Reviews.Author: Pablo Sozko
Reviews.Content: llego muy rapido y en el momento preciso.no tuve complicaciones ni tengo ninguna queja.Recomendado una buena camara a un costo bajo

Reviews.Title: Totally satisfied.
Reviews.Author: D. Jones
Reviews.Content: For such a small camera it does a good job. The pictures are great and the video is awesome. I would recommend this to my friends.

Reviews.Title: No memory card included
Reviews.Author: MaggieD
Reviews.Content: I sent this camera as a gift to a person unable to get out of the house.I was shocked that it did not have a memory card included. There was an empty small plastic case for a card. Only after I visited and went out to buy a card the camera could be used.It was disappointing that it was not complete.In the end the camera takes great photos

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Father Emanon
Reviews.Content: Our Canon broke, and they wanted $125 to repair it.For a fraction of the price, we picked up this NIkon.  The picture quality blows the Canon away.  Takes great pictures inside and out, and even takes decent video.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: A decent second camera
Reviews.Author: Pop-up aficienado
Reviews.Content: I have a Nikon D600, and am trying to get really good at photography, but as a backup just for quick documentation of an image or a setting, this very small camera is handy to keep in my purse or coat.  Its size is a little problematic, especially when you are used to a full size DSLR, which is the main reason I gave it only 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Camara
Reviews.Author: VE208035 JESUS ALFREDO OCHOA CUYARES
Reviews.Content: Transacción Rápida segura y confiable, buen producto y vendedor. El paquete llegó en el tiempo estimado de envío y en buen estado.

Reviews.Title: Buena cámara
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL
Reviews.Content: Era justo lo que quería, el producto cumplio con mis expectativas, excelente cámara, buenas imagenes, muy buen vendedor, lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Review for coolpix
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Gill
Reviews.Content: Although the camera was fine, my grandson asked for it for Christmas, I found it disappointing that it didn't come with a memory card or a case.

Reviews.Title: No SD card
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine. However I was under the impression that a SD cards was included.  It wasn't, so I had to go and buy one at a cost of under $20.Regards, Lucien

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Harry J. Wyant
Reviews.Content: Great bought for daughterin law and she just got one.  Gift certificates in future.  She wouldn't return and probably may not use iEverything as indicated in description and came promptly when ordered.  Great quick service and good quality  I like it I love it Hope this is twenty words.t but

Reviews.Title: Did not like
Reviews.Author: Diesel Power
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for Charismas and when she took pictures the pictures came out blurry tested with auto focuses and still blurry….the best thing was that the return process was great and fast.

Reviews.Title: the camera is not working properly
Reviews.Author: July
Reviews.Content: sorry the camera is not working properly, the focus is fixed, does not take pictures, how do I computer warranty?, I'm from Venezuela and here no guarantee

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Marissa M.
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good deal for under $100.  Takes good pictures and is easy to pick up and use immediately.  Would recommend for a beginner.

Reviews.Title: It's a bargain
Reviews.Author: William T.
Reviews.Content: Very appropriate accessories set, but a SD card is not present. Simple to use, but 16mp assures good quality pics.

Reviews.Title: lcd screen in not good
Reviews.Author: beso
Reviews.Content: a picture on the Lcd screen is no good ,it seems that resulation is not big.but pictures alsow is't so good

Reviews.Title: Poor quality, poor performance, poor batter, poor warranty coverage
Reviews.Author: K. Weakliem "KG"
Reviews.Content: This camera lasted me 10 months before it stopped working completely. I love to take pictures and would use it often and treat it with care. It has been inconsistent in its quality after the first few months, short battery life, inconsistent focusing, poor quality of pictures. The touch screen was nice but that was about it. I sent it in for the 1 year warranty repair and Nikon wanted to charge me $120 for fix it because the USB port was easy to damage, due to poor quality of design, and therefore it voided the warranty. Nikon will not repair any of it whether it is covered under warranty or not because the USB port does not work.  Nikon told me conflicting information regarding the repair and sent it back to me not repaired at all.  They have no regard to customer service either and could not bother to care that I was dissatisfied or not. I will never own a Nikon camera again after this experience!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera for my Kid
Reviews.Author: Muruga Hari
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter's birthday. She really liked it and she said it is very easy to use. She is only 8, but she loves it. It was delivered at right time. Shw wanted the purple color and she got the same. Overall my daughter is happy and I'm happy because she is happy. I too used it when we all went to South Dakota for a trip. Took lots of pictures. It wasn't that good inside the building pictures with Auto mode. I never got time to play with manual mode. For the price I paid, it is good camera.

Reviews.Title: Just bought one
Reviews.Author: Denni
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera today- it's light, easy to use, & takes great photos! It's my 2nd small digital camera & I really like it

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3300 16 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Practical Woman
Reviews.Content: I am a Nikon girl.  This is not an expensive camera but for the money I'm sure it's as good as you can expect.

Reviews.Title: Lens error right out of the box, will not work!
Reviews.Author: Florence G. Bradley
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with this camera since I just bought it today and it does not work at all!  I charged up the camera and then turned it on.  When I pressed the power button the lens extended and a blurry picture showed, followed by a lens error warning. The camera kept doing this no matter what buttons I pressed to engage it.  I also removed the battery and tried manipulating the lens to no avail! When I called customer service they asked if it was fully charged.  It was, and I even tried recharging it again but still the same problem.  Customer service with Nikon advised me to send it to them in New York.  Well I am leaving on a trip in a week so I have no time for this nonsense.  I am returning it tonight to Walmart and finding a different camera.  I have never had this happen with a brand new camera.

Reviews.Title: Very cute and colorful camera.
Reviews.Author: Sma57
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved the purple color and was delighted with the matching purple case I found on Amazon to go with it.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Sherri
Reviews.Content: Extremely slow and many many blurry pictures. I would not buy this camera again. There is really nothing more to add- Spend the money for better Quality.

Reviews.Title: Amazon's getting a little picky with the fine print!
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Nice that it was advertised as coming with a free chip - that you have to select separately.  An order packing slip would be nice also.

Reviews.Title: very good, except the image stabilization
Reviews.Author: suelyepp
Reviews.Content: The camera has a very good resolution and a lot of modes to modify the picture, but i can't take pictures during the moviments, it not works very well.

Reviews.Title: Sub Standard
Reviews.Author: RJL "RJL"
Reviews.Content: Nice looking camera. Controls on this are difficult to use. Pictures aren't as good as I would like. I've owned several cameras and what peeked my interest was the water proof and freeze proof option. I think it is better at that then quality of pictures and ease of use. You will be disappointed in the touch controls of this camera

Reviews.Title: Only small fingers
Reviews.Author: Ablejo
Reviews.Content: The position of the button to shoot movies is right in the back corner where most people put their thumb I find myself shooting movies before I realize it. I have used 35mm cameras for 40 years and I can't change how I hold my camera now. I'm not happy with Nikon they should know better. The pictures are fine but I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Owl
Reviews.Content: The camera is small, easy to take along and takes really terrific pictures.  I would give it a s a gift and feel happy knowing the gift recipient will like it as much as I do.

Reviews.Title: lousy camera
Reviews.Author: Basil Burrell
Reviews.Content: I have always thought that any camera made by Nikon had to great.  This camera taught me that you can't depend on brand name to mean great product.The software that came with the S3300 was useless.  I could not delete a bad picture.  There were numerous problems with the camera.  I sent it back and don't intend to buy another Nikon product.

Reviews.Title: I must have a lemon
Reviews.Author: L. Nieves "lvrofanimals"
Reviews.Content: First of all, I've been taking photographs for over 30 years. I have a 6mp digital cheapo that I wanted to upgrade and chose this Nikon. I have yet to get a clear picture out of this camera. First of all when you look at the scene through the display it's blurry. You have to use the telephoto/wide button to bring it into focus. then you press the shutter halfway so it'll focus it for you. What a joke 90 percent of my photos were blurry. Outdoors, indoors it didn't matter. I tried and tried, I read all the instructions I tried every setting and out of the 50 or so photos I shot I have 3 that were not blurry. I can focus faster with a single lens reflex and get perfect pictures all the time. My little 6mp camera has yet to take a blurry picture. I'm going to stick with my cheapo and do some more research but for now Nikon, deserves a big ZERO for this one.

Reviews.Title: venezuela
Reviews.Author: lervis zambrano
Reviews.Content: ilike You must be over 13 in order to write reviews on Amazon. Your review will be marked as an Amazon Verified Purchase. Reviews.Author: Margina Leiva
Reviews.Content: Not a very good camera, the screen is blury and the pictures are not very clear. not happy with this buy.

Reviews.Title: its probably ok but i dont like the WHERE the zoom is
Reviews.Author: nomommadrama
Reviews.Content: You zoom in and out on a turny thing, not a push up or down, and i find it more difficult to do w/ a single finger and plus, its RIGHT above the flash so my finger or another finger is constantly covering up some flash. It may be a great camera but the zooming is awkard for my hand

Reviews.Title: Such Terrible Close Up Pictures! Return Within 3 Days
Reviews.Author: Guang Hong
Reviews.Content: I'm a ebay power seller and I take a lot of close up pictures as well as beach shots for my son.  I did not get to try the outdoor shots because the close ups are of Such Poor Quality, under room or sun light, that I returned it after just 3 days!  It completely messed up my pretty items and if my hands even shake a very tiny bit, the picture comes out totally blurry.  Does not live up to the Nikon name at all!

Reviews.Title: dont buy this camera
Reviews.Author: rita
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Europe.  The camera's battery didnt last even for a couple of hours.  Alos, when I came home after several weeks, I couldnt return it because the window to return it closed.  Even worse, out of 150 pictures, only 90 transfered.  Amazon should be ashamed to sell this defective equipment without a 90 day return policy.  I am very upset and considering never buying from Amazon again!!!!Nikon COOLPIX S3300 16 MP Digital Camera with 6x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens and 2.7-inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: nikon
Reviews.Author: William E. Albart
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the money,  Had the early model of this same camera.  When swimming with it, had to replace it.

Reviews.Title: Save your money!
Reviews.Author: VSan
Reviews.Content: Terrible focus. Slow shutter. All images come out blurry. The flash is not right. The 6mp camera on my low budget cell is better!

Reviews.Title: Supposedly a good camera
Reviews.Author: Martin Weinstock
Reviews.Content: I personally don't use it but I heard of no complaints. k k k k k k k k k

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Curtis Jackson
Reviews.Content: I took about 40 pictures. When I tryed to load them on my computer it gave up none. Not a single picture. Sent the Chinese junk back.

Reviews.Title: This camera sucks
Reviews.Author: cloverab
Reviews.Content: It takes horrible pictures and I am returning it.  I will go back to Kodak.  Don't waste your money folks.
